articles.author: Artemis Moshtaghian, CNN
articles.title: Cleveland-area hospitals battling latest Covid-19 surge put ad in local paper that reads: 'Help' - CNN
articles.description: "Help" said the ad Sunday in the Cleveland Plain-Dealer, a response to the latest Covid-19 health crisis exploding in Northern Ohio, nearly two years into a pandemic that has killed more than 810,000 Americans and battered many of the nation's hospitals.

articles.author: Science Desk
articles.title: Meet ‘Baby Yingliang’, a well-preserved dinosaur embryo discovered inside fossilised egg - The Indian Express
articles.description: Oviraptorosaurs lived during the Cretaceous period(145 to 66 million years ago) in Asia and North America.
articles.content: From the rocks of Ganzhou in southern China, researchers have discovered a 72-to 66-million-year-old embryo inside a fossilised dinosaur egg. The embryo, named Baby Yingliang belongs to a toothless t… [+2077 chars]

articles.title: Taiwanese Mandopop star Wang Leehom to lose one third of his wealth to ex-wife as part of divorce settlement - Malay Mail

articles.title: With warning for unvaccinated, Biden lays out plan to fight surging Omicron - Reuters
articles.description: U.S. President Joe Biden announced on Tuesday more federal vaccination and testing sites to tackle a surge in COVID-19 driven by the Omicron variant, and said 500 million free at-home rapid tests will be available to Americans starting in January.

articles.author: Michelle Townsend
articles.title: Covid-19 Ireland: First Omicron symptom to look out for as variant becomes dominant strain - RSVP Live
articles.description: Omicron is now the dominant strain in Ireland and according to a recent report from the American Centre for Disease Control and Prevention, the majority of positive people have the same 'initial' sign of infection
articles.content:
With the Omicron variant of Covid-19 now accounting for the majority of cases in Ireland, experts have shared some of the very first symptoms associated with it.
